instructor.name: Joe Gornik
instructor.bio: Joe, an award-winning advertising specialist with 30 years of experience, joined Full Sail in 2011, teaching courses like Digital Storytelling and Typography. He was the CEO of Gornik Advertising and is recognized for his work on the Doctor Dolittle title sequence. His clients include top brands like HBO, Universal Pictures, and Bank of America. Joe holds an MFA in Media Design from Full Sail University.

instructor.name: Daniel Moye
instructor.bio: Daniel Moye holds a Bachelor of Arts in Commercial Art with an Advertising Minor from Flagler College. With over 35 years in the advertising industry, he spent 14 years as Creative Director/Owner at Alianda, 3 years as an adjunct professor, and 14 years as a Full Sail faculty member.

instructor.name: Fatima Rice
instructor.bio: Fatima Lotfi Rice is a Brazilian American painter, graphic designer, and conceptual artist with over 30 years of experience. She holds a BA in Visual Communication with a minor in Industrial Design and earned the Advanced Achievement Award as Valedictorian in her Master's in Media Design at Full Sail University. With 21 years of teaching Graphic Design at Full Sail, she has exhibited her artwork both locally and internationally.

instructor.name: Sarah Blue
instructor.bio: Sarah combines her love of photography and design to teach students how to capture and use stunning visuals in their work.

instructor.name: Carson Wampler
instructor.bio: Carson has over 10 years of experience teaching in Full Sail's Graphic Design program and freelancing as a graphic designer. He's taught courses like Typography, Color Theory, Digital Publishing, and Portfolio Creation. His freelance work spans event promotions, branding, UX design, and web design. Carson holds an Honors BFA from UCF, specializing in Conceptual Photography, Installation Art, and Sculpture, along with a Master's in Instructional Design & Technology.

instructor.name: Laura Brown
instructor.bio: Laura has extensive experience in 3D modeling and helps students bring their creative visions to life in three dimensions.

instructor.name: Chris Grey
instructor.bio: Chris loves motion graphics and enjoys teaching students how to create captivating animated visuals.

instructor.name: Jessica Pink
instructor.bio: Jessica specializes in UX/UI design and helps students create intuitive and engaging user interfaces.

instructor.name: Mark Silver
instructor.bio: Mark is an animation expert who teaches students the core principles of bringing characters and scenes to life.
